name: Enforce Package Structure
description: Validates that new files follow the required three-layer package layout

then.prompt: A new file was created. Verify it follows the required package structure. Every package directory must contain: docs/ (Layer 1 high-level specs), .kiro/steering/ (Layer 2 module conventions), .kiro/specs/ (Layer 3 implementation specs), a source directory, tests/, and pyproject.toml. If the file is in a location that violates this structure, warn the user and suggest the correct path. Ignore files at the workspace root level and inside the workspace-level .kiro/ directory.
